Body: Possible Duplicate:  When will my phone get the Android 2.2 update (FroYo)?  I'm having issues to upgrade my tablet to the 2.2 system. It's a generic tablet, from Kaser, I'm using it to develop a specific application. Now the specs changed, and I need it to run on 2.2. I had a look at their website and there is no info about the upgrading. Is it possible?Thier page
Title: Upgrading from Android 1.6 to 2.2

history.Text: I'm having issues to upgrade my tablet to the 2.2 system. It's a generic tablet, from Kaser, I'm using it to develop a specific application. Now the specs changed, and I need it to run on 2.2. I had a look at their website and there is no info about the upgrading. Is it possible?[Thier page][1][1]:http://www.kasercorp.com/productcart/pc/kaser-downloads.htm
